mapper.insert: insert into AF_REGION_INFO (DIQUID, DIQUNAME, ZONEID, ZONENAME, BANKTYPE, BANKTYPENAME, BANKID, BANKNAME) values (#{diquid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{diquname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zoneid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zonename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{banktype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{banktypename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankname,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select DIQUID, DIQUNAME, ZONEID, ZONENAME, BANKTYPE, BANKTYPENAME, BANKID, BANKNAME from AF_REGION_INFO
select distinct(t.banktypename) from AF_REGION_INFO t where t.zonename = #{zonename,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by nvl(length(trim(t.banktypename)),0)
select distinct(t.bankname) from AF_REGION_INFO t where t.zonename = #{zonename,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.banktypename = #{banktypename,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by nvl(length(trim(t.bankname)),0)
select t.* from AF_REGION_INFO t where t.bankname = #{bankname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
